text: nda Orion force and the Emerald Covenant Guardian races. The Emer- ald Covenant Founders races continued negotiations with any Anunnaki groups still interested in peaceful resolution of this building conﬂict, and on July 5, 2000 a new treaty called the Treaty of Altair, was agreed upon; most of the defecting Anunnaki groups reluctantly agreed to re-enter the Emer- ald Covenant upon the Emerald Covenant races’ promise to assist them in the presently unfolding Orion Wars of Density-3, in which Fallen Annu-Elohim Anunnaki holdings in Orion were under aggressive militant attack by the Omicron-Drakonian and Odedicron-Reptilian legions of Orion. 246
